casebody.data:
Rafael GONZALEZ, Plaintiff/Counter-Defendant-Appellee,
and
Kandis Purdie and Ricky Raines, Jr., Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
FARM BUREAU GENERAL INSURANCE COMPANY OF MICHIGAN, Defendant/Counter-Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
Crystal Chantal Burns, Defendant. SC: 157487
COA: 331956 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 11, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant/counter-plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 13, 2018.
